goals__remit:
Passerelle is a Brussels-based European public affairs practice of independent specialists in European Union affairs. Passerelle works creatively with clients to develop EU engagement strategies matched to clients' objectives. 
Reflecting the new ways of doing business in a digital, fast-changing world, we can quickly and efficiently bring together the ideal team of specialists locally, in Europe and globally to match our clients’ needs. 
Passerelle brings together clients and policymakers in constructive ways for the benefit of both parties eg through meetings, events, dialogues and platforms. 
We have multi-sector experience, with particular strengths in EU advocacy support to the legal and financial sectors. 
We are specialists in creating and managing specialist EU public/private sector fora to address emerging policy issues or challenges. 
Passerelle provides high level insights and intelligence, facilitate relationship building and partnerships, advise clients on positioning and EU engagement strategies.
